info.title: Astana Real Estate 2025
info.subtitle: 18,293 apartment listings from krisha.kz with coordinates, prices and features
info.description:
# Astana Real Estate Dataset

## Overview
Comprehensive dataset of apartment sale listings in Astana (Nur-Sultan), Kazakhstan, collected from krisha.kz in January 2025.

## Dataset Statistics
- **Records**: 18,293 cleaned listings
- **Features**: 37 columns
- **Time period**: January 2025
- **Coverage**: ~90% of active listings

## Key Features
- `price_kzt` - Price in Kazakhstani Tenge
- `price_per_m2_kzt` - Price per square meter
- `latitude`, `longitude` - Geo coordinates
- `rooms`, `area`, `floor`, `total_floors`
- `year_built` - Construction year (1950-2026)
- `district` - 6 districts of Astana
- `house_type` - Building type (monolith/brick/panel)

## Data Quality
- 100% fill rate for key columns (price, area, coordinates)
- Outliers removed (price/m² between 200k-2M KZT)
- Duplicates removed by listing_id
- Geographic outliers filtered (only Astana coordinates)

## Price Statistics
- **Median price**: 36.0 million KZT (~$76,000)
- **Median price/m²**: 590,909 KZT (~$1,250)
- **Price range**: 4.8 - 490 million KZT

## Use Cases
- Real estate price prediction models
- Market analysis and visualization
- Location-based price analysis
- Feature importance studies

## Source
Data collected via web scraping from krisha.kz (Kazakhstan's largest real estate portal)
